The app Food4All is developed to help the needy people get access to donated food items.

 There are 2 types of user accounts in the app\:
 1. Donor
 2. Beneficiary

 Donor can donate food item and also view his/her donations.
 Beneficiary can either benefit oneself or give it to other person in need and who doesn't have smart phone or this app.

 Let us experience "Joy of Giving" together!!!

Designed, developed \& maintained by:

 Aditi Mulik
 Priyanka Katkar
 Shoaib Shaikh
